I JUST HAVE TO TWEEK IT ALITTLE

you know what? life fucking sucks! for real...i taking my poor baby down to the welfare office with my tail between my legs...i stood in line with the dregs of society for hours reading all their propaganda about domestic violence and they're there to help, every woman and her children should feel safe, yaketty shmak...when it fucking came down to it they told me there was nothing they could do for us now...so, i asked them if the great state of massachusetts is telling me and my baby to sleep on the streets or go back to a possibly dangerous environment..."well, not exactly...hang in there...i'm a stupid cunt,,blah, blah" fucking bureaucracy....it makes me feel good that i have been paying taxes my whole life for this fucking shit
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/15436.html

so, i remembered i had this thing and decided to give it a whirl....let's see, i'm still the same boring, insane, awesome, suck person except now i'm a mom YAY! i love jude so much, it feels like i didn't exist before i had him, i'm so happy i did, except i wish he was the immaculate conception (when it comes to that, do you actually have to do the dirty deed with god? hhmmm..blasphemy) i finally cut his good for nothing father loose and i swear he's more stress now than when we were together....assclown,,,i can't think about him now, it's drivig me to drink, anger management class, anger management class, anger management class is keeping me from strangling his ass
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/15105.html

i am in the WORST mood today..don't fuck with me or you will get owned..don't know what came over me, i hate my job, hate the people i work with, and even the patients are making me want to punch...if i didn't know better i'd think it was PMS, but i know that's not the case...blah, i need to snap out of it! i was just dipping a brownie in strawberry frozen yogurt and it made me feel better until i was disgusted by myself, oh...blarg, i'm going to start my mommy and me yoga tape tonight (george bought it for me because he rocks and he's a punk rock legend which i found out the other day when we were at the movie theater, but that's a whole 'nother oprah show) it's so cool..you do it while you're pregnant so you don't turn into a moose, and when the baby's born there's parts you can do with her/him, sophie/jude...it's cool, to say the least...maybe that will help my funk ass attitude...damn i'm only 6 weeks along, and already i can't even stand myself...god has forsaken me, that's why
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/14915.html

i seriously want to move to hawaii...i have been looking online and it seems almost doable, rent isn't that high, cheaper than here (but where isn't?) there are some job listings that i can do, i'm really going to try, i just need to find a place and a job for me and george...i just want my baby to have a nice childhood...and hawaii is so beautiful, if it's at all possible, i want my baby to have it...at least the baby will be able to play outside more that 1 month out of the year...god i hate this place
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/14762.html

http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/14571.html

i feel gross, it sucks...i need to take my anti-anxiety meds, but i'm scared it might cause burth defects or something, my doc doesn't think so, but i need to know for sure...i feel all antsy, and i don't want to sit at my desk anymore, but i have no choice because i'm an indentured servant, i think i'll just whine all day, because it really endears me to people....
i ate 2 snickers for lunch, i know i'm going be a MOOSE by the time i'm about 6 months, but it's all for a good cause, a pimpkin-can't wait
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/14084.html

could it ANY COLDER? weeping jesus on the cross! it's got to be 20 below out, i froze my ass off on my way to work this morning...then i stole a hat from the hat tree downstairs (the hat tree is a christmas tree in the lobby decorated with hats, because it's the cancer center and the patients are bald, all the hats are donated so the patients can just take one...but since i was freezing and couldn't bear the thought of the trip home w/out a hat, i swiped one) i love it, it's cute and blue and fuzzy. 

it's so damn busy here today! fanabla...and i have been feeling like puking for about an hour...not a good position to be in
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/13994.html

i just got off the phone with my doc...i am so happy a tear just fell on my keyboard...i am still pregnant! maybe i should explain..i found out i was pregnant, then not even a week later, i got into a car accident and had to stay in bed for over a week, doctors orders...so i did, went back to work mon, then tues morning, i started bleeding, i freaked went to the doc who said i was probably miscarrying. i was devastated, obviously...so he doped me up and sent me home and i slept and woke up, and no of the shit that he said would happen did...no cramping, clots, nasty shit like that...none of it happened...so i called and went to see him and we did tests and I AM HAVING A BABY!!! woo-hoo!
well, i have to go or i'll miss the shuttle,,,later
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/13817.html

so..i pulled an all-nighter last night and i at work, it less-than-desirable position...i didn't do it on purpose, but by the time george and i were done doing very important stuff(nudge, nudge)it was 5:00 and there was no point in going to bed...fuck, i shouldn't even have to work today! it's a mother-grabbing holiday! and my dad was a vet who died as a result of the war...that's it, i'm staging a walk-out...well, maybe not, i need this job...george started his new job sat, it was really hard work for little money, not like managing...well, that's what you get for doing what happens when you do something retarded like he did. he goes to court a week from today, i hope to god he doesn't go to jail, i doubt he will, but it's just that tiny chance that's making me an OCD loon.
i really love him, and i totally didn't want to. he lives with me now, we cook dinner and eat together, watch the same movies over and over because my cable got shut off..we don't really watch them, we talk and laugh and he rubs my feet...last night he woke up and said
 "I want to be with you forever, I mean it, I would never do anything to hurt you, I will do everything possible to keep you always"
no lie, he honestly said that...whoa
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/13354.html
this promotion is the worst thing that has ever happened to me...i hate my job and my throat hurts...son of a bitchie
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/13207.html

my worst nightmare came true today...a freaking pigeon landed on my head! i so want to puke...i HATE birds, i hate everything about them feathers, beaks, those nasty feet-things...GA-ROSS!! ugh, i want to die..it's nasty foot-things dug into my scalp, it was terrible, and i think it gave me the plague
barf
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/13018.html

What day are you?
my real name is maura; which means "sorrow" in gaelic...and my mom said that the first thing i did when i was born and they put me in her arms, i frowned...i guess i was fated to be a miserable prick
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/12766.html

so...i don't know, i just haven't been feeling verbose lately, even though i shopuld have alot say...flarg...hm, well, i've gone and done it again, the one thing i never wanted to do again...i got a boyfriend, i don't even know how it happened, really...i've known him for a long time and i never would have imagined...he's still techically married, is about to plead guilty to a felony which he could do 2 years in prison for, lost his job due to said felony..he's a giant, legit-he's like 6'4 and 330 pounds, covered in ink, dreadlocks, the whole nine...and he is also the sweetest, goofiest man i have ever known, and i love him...what a choad i am, he hasn't left my house in like a month, it's great, i feel goofy and happy and safe....

god i suck so bad
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/12476.html

i am so ill, i thought i was getting better, but then i got worse...god has forsaken me, where's your precious faggot now? i want to go home so badly but i'm training this woman who is an absolute retarded, i am losing all patience with her, she's been in the hospital 27 years and get even work the phone....FANABLA!!! i want to sleep.
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/12082.html

i haven't written in so long...i just haven't felt like thinking about my life lately, it has been crap, legit crap...but what else is new right? i get mad at myself for being depressed and i try to pretend that i'm not, then i start with the panic attacks and the doc has to give me enough crazy pills to tranquilize a rhino...no good. i absolutely despise dave because i love him. he is such an ass to me, i am absolutely done with him, molly, if you ever sleep with dave again i will bash you with my fist! there, it's settled, i don't want to have to bash myself.

enough of this nonsense...i talked to mikey last night for the first time in so long, it was good, he likes his new place and i'm happy for him, he's doing good...when he moved he left the turkey in the freezer that was there for years, it was there for about 2 years when i moved out 3 years ago...dude, that messed up, mike said there is gonna be an e true hollywood story on the turkey..it felt so good to talk to him, he always makes me feel better, i know that he understands me and will always care about me, i'm so lucky to have him in my life...

yeah, so this weekend should be fun even though i'm broke and i have all these plans that involve dollars, well, i'll work something out...going apple picking saturday with katie and i'm taking aidan (aka badoodles) it's going to be awesome they have hay rides and a hay jump and pumpkins, can't wait...then saturday night is the skells show..

word
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/11894.html

i am so bored with everything right now...i just can't get out of this funk, i feel like i've been fighting to be happy forever and i'm just tired of it, bored...my dad used to say "you're not bored, you're boring"...he thought that was so funny, but it's true...i have to do something, find something, love something...

easier said than done...

katie found a kitty that mom is going to keep, i'm glad, i think it will make her happy (or as happy as to be expected)

i feel like the only thing that could get me excited again would have to be something serious, life-changing, like jumping out of a plane or something...i just don't know
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/11768.html
you know what i hate? pretention...enough said
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/11326.html
this diet will be the death of me, i am convinced...there was a flyer for domino's in my mailbox and i started foaming at the mouth, and i don't even like pizza normally
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/11173.html

so? i don't know...it's 9/11 and i don't know how i'm supposed to react to it...i seem to be the only one not making a big deal out of it..patients are cancelling their appointments because they're scared to come into the city, come on, i doubt anything is going to happen, and if it happens, it happens, i personally am not going to live the rest of my life in fear because i'm american, i thought it was supposed to be the other way around...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/10770.html

i got the strangest phone call last night, late,...around midnight...i didn't pick up because the caller id was blocked and i don't get down like that, so when i checked the message it was a recording of chris farley's voice patched together into strange phrases, at first i thought it was kind of funny...but because i live alone, of couse i start hearing weird noises, and i became a scared little girl, i guess i'm not as tough as i think i am...so, of course i could not fall asleep after that, so i'm miserable today...bollox...

my hair is flourescent..beyond blonde, when i first did it i thought it looked crap, but now i think i like it, doesn't hurt that dave said i looked like marilyn monroe, sweet

i'm sleepy..

over the course of the weekend i bought four more plants, it's an illness; i need help, soon i'll need a machete to get through my apartment
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/10622.html

i have to admit i'm disappointed, i mean ZACK for christ's sake!! I am 0-20% Ghetto

I don't even know what ghetto is? Fuckin Preppy. I better hop in my beamer - head for the hood and get some chicken, watermelon, and neports.
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/10300.html

i love vince vaughn, he is my favorite man, wicked hot..it's that voice of his, gets me everytime..i want him to call me "babe" i think my knees would buckle, i bet it would be as good as the time i gave g-love a smooch and he said "thanks babe"..i still get all giddy thinking about that and it was years ago, he is that hot, and vince vaughn has that hint of a twang, even better...whew. i need to relax, 


it's friday again, i don't know what i'm doing this weekend, i just want to stay home and rest but i know i'd get lonely because i'm alone most of the week and the weekend is the only time i have to spend with my friends...
i promised karen i'd go on the booze cruise with her but i don't really want to, i still don't think i'm up to boozing since my near death-by-pan-fried-noodles incident, i have to go though, i don't hang ou with her enough and her boyfriend is here from california, i know it mean alot to her...screw it, i'll go...i don't have the heart not to...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/10200.html

so, i had food poisoning...the worst experience of my life, it sucked so bad, i still don't feel well, and i haven's eaten in going on 3 days...i hurt, i'm ill...so i had an EXTRA long weekend, but the last 2 days were not fun, i did not move from my couch, it was not good,..walking here from north station took all of my energy, i thought i was going to faint, for real...


anyway, speaking of not eating, i'm going shopping with chon-ti after work, i'm starting the diet she's on tomorrow, and i have to buy special food...no flour, nor sugar, which is going to be HELL ON EARTH, but i'll live, chon-ti's already lost 10 pounds and has gone down a size after two weeks, which is pretty bomb, if you ask me...
yeah so, blah...nothing too interesting happened to me on my death bed...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/9801.html

i would love to smoke right now, but still an hour until lunch...blarg...


today blows, we are so understaffed and underappreciated at my job this week it makes me want to start throwing 'bows...and it's dreary and wet outside, i like the rain, when i'm at home, especially in bed, all cozy, mmmm, and i really like thunderstorms, but i do not like cold, drizzly rain on my way to work with no bumberchute...


i watched mr. mom last night and laughed my ass off, that movie is wicked good..."i'm going downstairs to sleep on the fat couch, if i can fit through the door"...hilarious, and michael keaton is a babe, he was the best batman, too...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/9663.html

ok, i know you will read this, but it's more for me than you, this has been bothering me for a long time, and i need to get it off my chest, so here goes...you are my best friend and i care deeply about you, but you have a serious personality flaw that has gotten WAY out of control the past couple of years, you always have to be the center of attention, and people can get away with that when they're kids, but when it's an adult, it's just not cute, it has made you self-centered and ego-centric, thoughtless, and annoying, the fact that you left me at a bar with no way home so you could hook up with some guy who by the way, said he was only going home with you because it had been a while and you were "a sure thing", no lie, but anyway..the only time you even thought about how you screwed me, was when you realized i was mad at you, and even then, you made it about you! "you are the only person who calls me, you're my only friend, blah, blah blah.." what about me? you wonder why you have no friends! because you treat people like an afterthought in your pursuit of being "hot" or whatever you're trying to do...seriously shitty, seriously...you are not coming of as cute, you are coming off as trashy and slutty and not the least bit charming...i am sick of hearing it from you, it's boring, and there used to be other things to your personality than your realationships with guys...it's sooo boring and honestly, gross, the way you demean yourself...


and i can no longer stand the way you do not listen to anyone when you talk, maybe because i've known you so long it bothers me more or i notice it more, whatever, but i do notice, the way after i finish talking you say stuff like "anyway,i" or "yeah, i mean, it's like" and continue talking about yourself...like you have something more important to say, like you know more about whatever it is we're talkingabout than i do, you are ALWAYS trying to one up me, ALWAYS! even when my dad died, first of all, i called you the night it happened and the day after and the day after that to talk to my "best friend" and instead of calling me back you went out with colleen, and i know you knew i called because i spoke with both carla and carlos, but whatever, that's not the worst of it, but that was pretty shitty, the worst thing is every time i try to talk to you about my grief over LOSING MY DAD you turn it around and make it about you! "yeah, i blah blah blah" and "when linda died blah blah blah" even you can know that linda dying is no way the same as my dad, so spare me, please...can you even see you do this? can you stop? you do it to everybody and that is one of the reasons why people don't like you, but the fact that you do it to you "best friend" after her FATHER DIES is seriuosly wrong and disturbing

and please! i know you said this isn't the case,but 15 years with the same pattern really does make it the case..because i do something or have a certain characteristic you do not need it also, i get sick, you get sick, i smoke menthols, you smoke menthols, these are just 2 examples, you know in your heart of hearts you have been doing this as long as i've know you...is it a strange coincidence that ONCE AGAIN not even a week after i get prescribed meds from the shrink you have a "nervous breakdown" you don't even know what that is, you have no idea, you had a hissy fit because i was mad at you, and it is belittling to me and my illness that you fake it every time you more attention from mommy, when are you going to grow up?

sometimes i wonder why i'm still friends with you, it can be so stressful and i don't need any added stress...but i think if maybe we can try to settle things and you try to LISTEN to what i am trying to say, it's not worth throwing away a 14 year friendship...i hope so anyway
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/9290.html

i've done alot of thinking and i have finally accepted something i have been afraid of most of my life; i am all alone, i can't depend on anyone else...it's not as bad as i thought it would be, realizing that there actually is no one out there that truly cares about me, i know i have been used by at least two people who claimed to have loved me, and it is really unfortunate that they both showed their true colors on the same night..i was so upset, but sometimes it takes a traumatizing experience to open my eyes and accept the truth...it's easy to blow off things i don't want to think about when everything seems ok....

i'm fine now, it's actually empowering, i know one thing though, i want to get out of this place, i have nothing holding me down, my mom, but she'd understand, she wants me to be happy, i want move somewhere that nobody knows me, far away, where it would take as great effort for people from here to come visit, i used to want to get a pick-up truck and a dog and move to montana,big sky country,  but i don't think i could live there with out thinking of the movie deliverance whenever i saw a local...i think i'd like england...i would need to find a job, though...hmmm...

maybe i'll just stay here and become a hermit, i wish i could have cats in my apartment, because i want to be like that crazy lady on the simpsons who throws her cats at people...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/9038.html

Which Rainbow Brite kid are you? By Growing. oh, how i loved rainbow brite when i was little! chon-ti got a doll rb from ebay in the box! it is too adorable! i think now that we've hit our mid-twenties (how scary is that? yesterday i was 19, i swear!) we're getting all nostalgic for our childhood, i b bought a my little pony from ebay, i am a DORK, for real. so, either i look especially fly today or i had a major shnoog hanging from my nose because i was turning alot of headson the t, must just be my charisma acting up again, haha, probably a shnoog
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/8959.html

just got back from the shrink, it was ok, he prescribed me new crazy pills (or anti-crazy, would be more accurate) you know you're in rough shape when the doc offers you a choice between klonipins and something else, coo-coo pins! prescribed! i was tempted, but i really don't need to be addicted to anything else, seriously, so i went w/a similar, less addictive one, neurontin. i should've went for the coo-coo's, they would be fun and in a pinch, they could supplement my income :)$! anyway, those are supposed to help my anxiety and my nightmares along with the new anti-depressant i got, because i am apparently the only human who doesn't respond to celexa(the newest wonder-drug) i swear the next step is electric-shock, which wouldn't be so bad, at least then i'd have an excuse for drooling!
so, the new shrink isn't so bad even though heesa notso strong weetha engleesh, ah? i think he's from mother russia, nice guy, apparently competent doctor, so ok in my book....but while in the waiting room i noticed every single patient i saw was a woman, not a single man! what's up with that? i think women have a harder time dealing with shit than men because we actually think and aren't heartless pricks, but i could biased because i hate men.
AND! they had the most fucked up painting in the waiting room, it was a picture of sandals with greek letters and a bunch of other weird-ass shit going on, i think i went schitzo just looking at it, why would they put that in with the nuts? every where else in the hospital there's pictures of flowers and sailboats and crap but in the PSYCH office they put this random fucking thing that looks like georgia o'keefe puked up a sam & libby catalog, WHY,GOD, WHY? 

oh, and of course doc told me to lay of the drinking for a while, which is what all my doctors tell me (i feel like an after-school special) but this time i'm listening, i decided to lay off the sauce myself already, it makes me feel crappy, it costs allot of $$ and it makes me fat, i don't walk 3 miles a day just to put millions of empty calories back into my thighs, at about $50 a night, fuck that.

so, yeah, hopefully these meds will help, let's hope, if not, oh well, whatever, nevermind...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/8453.html

You are 49% geek
You are a geek liaison, which means you go both ways. You can hang out with normal people or you can hang out with geeks which means you often have geeks as friends and/or have a job where you have to mediate between geeks and normal people. This is an important role and one of which you should be proud. In fact, you can make a good deal of money as a translator.
Normal: Tell our geek we need him to work this weekend.

You [to Geek]: We need more than that, Scotty. You'll have to stay until you can squeeze more outta them engines!

Geek [to You]: I'm givin' her all she's got, Captain, but we need more dilithium crystals!

You [to Normal]: He wants to know if he gets overtime.

Take the Polygeek Quiz at Thudfactor.com

i rule.. I am 58% Metal Head

I rock just as hard as the rest of the thrash set, except when no ones looking I like to get down with a little "More than a Feeling."

Take the Metal Head Test at fuali.com and finally...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/8272.html

i am NOT a racist, i do not associate with racists, i live in massachusetts, not mississippi, i have all my teeth, higher than a fourth grade education, i weigh less than 3 bills, and i don't chew tabaccy...i do not care to waste my time on people who do...i also, am not a "skinbird" or whatever they call themselves (i am a woman and enjoy looking like one)...i like TRADITIONAL skinheads (non-racist) because i like their music, style of dress, and for some reason i'm drawn to men with bad-ass attitudes, okay? i will not speak with any slack-jawed yokels about any of their white-power bullshit, so do not email me or im me, i will not respond, you are wasting your time, as a matter of fact, if you were lying helpless on the street bleeding, i would promptly spit on you...now, PISS OFF!!!
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/8173.html

ok, i alreday wrote this once, and then my computer pooped out, so here we go again...last night i was very tired and i fell asleep around 9, so of course i woke up around 2ish and couldn't fall back asleep until 5:30, that's when i had this vivid dream that i was in the hospital because i got hit by a car and broke my leg in two placed and busted some ribs, the doctor was telling me that i'd have to walk with a cane, and i started crying and freaking out, and my alarm went off and i got up and got ready and left for work, i was feeling foggy all the way there and, wouldn't you know it, as i was crossing causeway st a car came to a screeching hault like 2 inches away from me, legit. i screamed, the whore driver screamed and so did this lady on the sidewalk, it was so scary, i swear, i almost voided my bladder, to put it delicately...i'm still all shakey and nauseous from it...so, after that brush with death, i was walking through the coutyard/park/bike path/thing to get here and i saw this little asian woman staring up at the trees, walking v e r y slowly backwards, COMBING HER HAIR, slowly and deliberately; it was a david lynch moment, and i am officially freaked
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/7894.html

my apartment is now officially furnished! woo-hoo! my downstairs neighbor gave me a couch with a pull-out bed, which was wicked cool of her...dave and i carried (or dragged and pushed) that fucking thing up to my third floor apartment, which was not cool, that fucking thing is so heavy!!! and at one point it fell on my leg and i have a GNARLY bruise, it is huge! it covers my entire upper thigh, but it makes me look tough, so i don't mind.

it's raining out which i'm diggin, but i wasn'ton the way to work without a bumbershute(as my mom says) i would like to go for a run in it, though...

one of our pts. is dying, she's only 34, i just spoke to  her girlfriend (partner) and she's  hysterical, god, sometimes this job is too fucking hard
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/7522.html

i miss my dad..this girl i work with just lost her mom, and though we never really talked before we just had a sort-of heart-to-heart because we have this common bond; grief...she asked me how long it took for me to "get over it" and i told her i haven't and that we never will, i've just gotten better at hiding it, which i think is a start (at what, i don't know, maybe acceptance, some day) i feel like a house without a foundation, i feel homeless, empty, he was such a huge part of my life, who am i now that i don't have him to tell me that i fucked up, or that i'm doing the right thing? it almost doesn't seem real if i don't have my father, i am a girl without a father, worse than that, without my father...
we finally got his headstone, but i haven't been to the cemetery to see, that would just be too final, i don't think i'm ready, every time i go there i can still hear the bagpipes...the funeral was beautiful, he would have approved, we sang danny boy by the grave and i think i'm going to get "danny boy, i love you so" tattooed in celtic letters around my leg, even though he hated tattoos especially on me, it's something i want, to make it a part of me, he always will be, but i want it to show, it's comforting to me
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/7223.html
What kind of drunk are you? i was seriously going to quit drinking for a while, but now i have a reputation to live up to
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/7117.html

a midget just body checked me in the cafe, and didn't even say excuse me, and he packed quite a whollop for a little dude... prick, dutch nazi..i don't discriminate, i will fight a little person, he'd better watch his back

if my sister's baby is boy, aidan wants to name him squirtle, which would be killer...
http://myirishmolly.livejournal.com/6786.html

what the fuck is wrong with me? why do i insist on torturing myself? for fucks sake!!!!!!!!! arghh! he makes me miserable, i make myself miserable, i need to stop!! from now on i am not available for any type of heartbreaking situations, seriously...
maybe it's not so bad being alone, it's definately better than always doubting and hurting...
